Name: Corner Gas Animated
Title: Shelter Skelter
Desc: Hank and Oscar build a shelter; Emma traps Brent and Lacey so they can hash things out.
LongDescription: Hank and Oscar team up to build a shelter for the apocalypse and Davis, Karen and Wanda argue over who would be the best leader; Emma traps Brent and Lacey in the cellar so they can hash things out.
